data.actual_result: The message shines when you edit it too
data.expected_result: The message should bright only when you jump to it
data.short_description: When you jump to a message and edit it, the message shines twice.
data.steps_to_repro: - Jump to a message (the message need to be yours) - Edit it (you don't really need to edit, just press "Edit" then "Save")
